name: HOPE (itch) (Gorka1)
description:
A game by Jorge Velasquez (@Gorka_Man on Twitter)

Made for Ludum Dare 46

Theme: "Keep It Alive"

The world needs hope. You must keep the fight alive.
Organize a new party and campaign for the majority in Parliment!

Special thanks to Axomatic

Type in commands into the prompt.
"help" tells what you can do.
"nation" gives the state of the nation.
"party" gives the state of the party.
